name: The Sigil
description:
THE SIGIL is a story-driven melee combat game set within a child's imagination. Delve into his psyche and explore a past best left forgotten. 

Features
  • A Story Mode to uncover the hidden monsters in his thoughts.
  • A Versus Mode to support up to 4 players in a competitive free-for-all.
  • Adaptive AI that reacts and morphs its playstyle.
Roster

The Bandit is a nimble fighter that excels in guerrilla tactics. Armed with throwable daggers and a smoke bomb. 

The Crusader is a hardened warrior with a strong moral compass, but would still take your head off though. He is capable of creating barriers to raise defence.

The Berserker is an (emotionally unstable) glass cannon with quick attacks. By enraging himself, he regenerates stamina and attacks much faster.

Note: This version of The Sigil is a very early alpha build, and is not indicative of the final game. It contains flashing colours/lights. Got a bug? Dm me at @uinkmachine or comment below!
